vehicles.description: A white car is parked on the right side of the road, with its front facing perpendicular to my vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: It is stationary, indicating there is no immediate dynamic interaction, but one must remain alert to the possibility of doors opening or pedestrians stepping out.

vehicles.description: There is a dark-colored car on the left, positioned perpendicular to our vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: If this vehicle enters this lane or any unexpected maneuvers occur, it may pose a potential hazard.

general_perception.description and explanation: The image shows two vehicles. The first is a white car parked on the right side of the road with its front facing perpendicular to my vehicle. This car is stationary, implying no immediate dynamic interaction, but caution is necessary due to the potential of doors opening or pedestrians appearing. The second is a dark-colored car positioned on the left, also perpendicular to our vehicle. This vehicle could pose a potential hazard if it enters the lane or makes any unexpected maneuvers. There are no vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, barriers, or other objects present in the image.

driving_suggestion: Due to low visibility and parked vehicles, please drive carefully. Maintain a low speed and be prepared to stop if there is any unexpected activity around parked vehicles. This vehicle should also be prepared for any sudden actions from vehicles on the left side and be ready to slow down or change lanes when it is safe to do so. If not already on, please use the headlights.

1.description and explanation: This is an automobile, specifically a car, with illuminated headlights that appears to be in motion. Given that the vehicle is located on the road in front of the ego vehicle, the ego vehicle should maintain a safe following distance, monitor the car's speed and direction, and be prepared to adjust its speed or change lanes if necessary to avoid a collision or to follow traffic rules.
